backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, intake state, playlists, OTT sessions, staff settings, and authorized CRUD operations with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files covering hooks, components, pages, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router defining all routes and global providers including theme, playback, and media activity.
frontend/src/components/BackNavButton.ts: Back navigation button that triggers custom back-navigation logic via keyboard or pointer.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothPairing: Bluetooth control for Bose QuietComfort Ultra with connection status, error toasts, and connect/disconnect actions.
frontend/src/components/BottomBars.tsx: Layout component managing bottom padding and stacking of Now Playing and Emergency Talk bars based on activity state.
frontend/src/components/DashboardDisplay: Dashboard-local toggle to switch between Front and Back display modes using useDisplayMode.
frontend/src/components/DisplayModeToggl: Toggle UI letting users switch between Front and Back display modes with icon buttons.
frontend/src/components/EmergencyTalkBar: Floating bar that toggles emergency talk mode, pausing or resuming audio and video.
frontend/src/components/GlassTile.tsx: Reusable glass-style card that supports click and keyboard activation for interactive tiles.
frontend/src/components/HomeNavButton.ts: Home button that clears intake state and navigates to the root route unless already there.
frontend/src/components/LocalFileAudioPl: Audio player for locally selected files with play/pause, volume, timeline, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/NowPlayingBar.ts: Now playing footer showing current item with playback controls, volume, and emergency talk restrictions.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBadge.tsx: Displays offline availability status and optional download/remove action for content.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingHint.t: Small glass-panel hint box displaying onboarding information with an info icon.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting the user to enter their name and saving the profile via API.
frontend/src/components/StaffEntryGestur: Long-press gesture that opens a staff passcode dialog and navigates to staff mode on success.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, language selector, display toggle, Bluetooth control, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeFallbackP: Provides an embedded YouTube player fallback for audio programs, with error handling and external link opening.
frontend/src/contexts/MediaActivityConte: Context provider tracking whether video content is active and exposing a setter.
frontend/src/contexts/PlaybackContext.ts: Manages global audio playback state, queue navigation, error handling, and safe volume enforcement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Implements an HTMLAudioElement wrapper with play control, metadata tracking, and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackNavigation.ts: Tracks navigation history and exposes a goBack function with route-specific fallback logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBoseQuietComfortUl: Manages Web Bluetooth connection to Bose QuietComfort Ultra devices, handling connect, disconnect, errors, and sessionStorage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBottomBarLayout.ts: Computes bottom bar offsets and padding based on visibility of Now Playing and Emergency bars.
frontend/src/hooks/useClinicalSafety.ts: Tracks and persists emergency talk activation state using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDisplayMode.ts: Stores and syncs per-route display mode across components via sessionStorage and custom events.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntakeState.ts: Manages intake form state with sessionStorage persistence and helpers for completion logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and logout with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguagePreference: Stores and updates user's language preference in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaActivity.ts: Exposes media activity context with safety check for provider presence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayback.ts: Provides access to playback context with required provider enforcement.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wrapper hooks around react-query for fetching and mutating backend data via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffSettings.ts: Manages staff authentication flag with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes including glassmorphism and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/Dashboard.t: Renders the dashboard with personalized module tiles based on intake state, mood, profile, and anxiety levels.
frontend/src/pages/Intake/IntakeFlow.tsx: Implements a multi‑step intake wizard for profile, mood, vibe, and anxiety, navigating to the dashboard upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/Modules/Audiobooks/Au: Renders audiobook categories with kid/adult tabs and opens external category links based on intake profile.
frontend/src/pages/Modules/Audiobooks/Ca: Displays a clickable audiobook category tile with icon, description, and external link indicator.
frontend/src/pages/Modules/AudioPharmacy: Displays recommended audio programs, supports offline downloads, and starts playback for selected programs.
Shows the active audio program player with volume controls, error handling, and a YouTube fallback option.
frontend/src/pages/Modules/Cinema/Cinema: Shows enabled OTT providers, saves session data, and opens provider links with a continue-watching section.
frontend/src/pages/Modules/RegionalRadio: Provides language‑based music playlists with tabbed filtering and external provider links.
frontend/src/pages/Modules/VisualEscapes: Manages visual escape videos, kids‑only content, offline playback, and modal video interactions with safety hooks.
Staff controls for volume limits, premium toggles, OTT provider enablement, and headset battery status.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Utility to build correct asset URLs using the app’s base path.
frontend/src/utils/externalLinks.ts: Defines centralized external links for Spotify, YouTube, kids cartoons, and audiobooks, organized by language and category.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records for the Aspen Calm build.
